title: How to Use the Zoku Slush & Shake Maker | Williams-Sonoma
description: Learn how to make delicious slushies or frosty milkshakes in just a matter of minutes with the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker.  Just place your frozen Zoku Shake and Slush Maker insert into the colorful cup that protects your hands from the cold, pour in juice, soda or even chocolate milk and the fun begins!  Take the spoon and scrape down the insides of the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker as your beverage of choice freezes and, in just a few minutes, you'll have a delicious slush or shake that's ready to be eaten!

asset.author: Williams-Sonoma
asset.hookText:
Learn how to make delicious slushies or frosty milkshakes in just a matter of minutes with the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker.  Just place your frozen Zoku Shake and Slush Maker insert into the colorful cup that protects your hands from the cold, pour in juice, soda or even chocolate milk and the fun begins!  Take the spoon and scrape down the insides of the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker as your beverage of choice freezes and, in just a few minutes, you'll have a delicious slush or shake that's ready to be eaten! 

The Zoku Slush and Shake Maker can be purchased at Williams-Sonoma: http://www.williams-sonoma.com/products/zoku-slushie-milkshake-maker/

transcripts: I'm constantly looking fro new treat ideas to make with my kids and we fell in love with the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker. It's so easy to use and we can practically put any of our favorite drinks in it to make a slushy or a shake. You'll see that this insert can actually just go right into your freezer. I keep these in the freezer. You could just freeze it overnight or for 4 - 6 hours if you're really on a crunch and pop it right into the glass here
